li.description: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We have a duty to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.

li.description: I'm terrified. I killed someone attacking our colony. My hands are still shaking..

li.description: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. I can't believe we participate in that barbarism.
